      • removeVertex

        public Vertex<T> removeVertex​(T value)
        Vertex removing. Removes vertex and all incident edges if vertex exists. Edges deletion MUST BE SPECIFIED in child-classes!
        Parameters:
        value - value of vertex
        Returns:
        deleted vertex or null if it doesn't exist

      • addEdge

        public boolean addEdge​(T a,
                       T b,
                       double weight)
        Edge creation. Creates edge (a,b) with specified weight if edge (a,b) doesn't exist. Creates vertices `a` and `b` if they don't exist If `directed == false` also creates edge (b,a) with specified weight
        Parameters:
        a - first vertex
        b - second vertex
        weight - double value
        Returns:
        `true` if edge was created

      • removeEdge

        public boolean removeEdge​(T a,
                          T b)
        Edge removing. Removes edge (a,b) if it exists and (b,a) if graph is undirected and this edge exists.
        Parameters:
        a - first vertex value
        b - second vertex value
        Returns:
        `true` if all deletions were successful

      • constructShortestDistances

        public java.util.Map<T,​java.lang.Double> constructShortestDistances​(T start)
        Shortest paths finder. Calls dijkstra algorithm for non-negative graphs and bellman-ford otherwise
        Parameters:
        start - value of start vertex
        Returns:
        map with vertices and path lengths or `null` if negative cycle was detected

      • relaxEdge

        Edge relaxation.
        Parameters:
        edge - edge for relaxing
        Returns:
        `true` if edge was relaxed so that second vertex distance was reduced
